dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] FW: Copyright Infringement. Please remove site from your service.]
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, June 08, 2005 4:58 PM
To: katie@verio.net
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] FW: Copyright Infringement. Please remove site from
your service.]

Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.

-------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] FW: Copyright Infringement. Please remove site from
your        service.
Date: Wed, 8 Jun 2005 13:15:18 -0600
From: Katie L. Smith <katie@verio.net>
To: <abuse@theplanet.com>

We have not yet received a response from The Planet regarding the below
matter. Please respond immediately with an update for this issue.
Sincerely,
Katie Smith
Legal Department
Verio Inc.

-----Original Message-----
From: Katie L. Smith [mailto:katie@verio.net]
Sent: Wednesday, June 01, 2005 8:37 AM
To: 'abuse@theplanet.com'
Subject: FW: Copyright Infringement. Please remove site from your service.
Importance: High

ATTN The Planet:



We have received the following notification of copyright infringement
regarding the site of one of your customers. In accordance with the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act (DMCA), 17 U.S.C.
